aircraft.value: Talon Swift - AC-3844-280 at Maintenance Hub-Y

defect_observed.value: Ignition system misfire. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Compressor Section component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 28/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 29/05/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 29/05/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 04/06/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 04/06/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma
